post.description: The API takes the pickup and drop Pincode and returns an array of all the serviceable carrier partners and their corresponding shipping charges and committed SLAs

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Enter the username of the Clickpost dashboard

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Enter the API key given to you by the Clickpost team

message.example: Authentication Failed: Invalid Token or API Key

post.description: By entering the drop_pincode, the enterprises can determine whether the Pincode is serviceable by any of their active carriers or not.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Enter the username of the Clickpost dashboard

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Enter the API key given to you by the Clickpost team

get.description: By entering the carrier partner ID and account code, the enterprise can get all the serviceable drop and pickup pincodes

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Enter the username of the Clickpost dashboard

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Enter the API key given to you by the Clickpost team

parameters.name: courier_partner_id
parameters.description: The courier partner ID from the Clickpost dashboard

parameters.name: account_code
parameters.description: Name registered on Clickpost dashboard for particular carrier partner

message.example: Field 'partner_id' expected a number but got '"4"'.

oneOf.title: Invalid account code/ courier partner id

message.example: Invalid account code/ courier partner id

get.description: By entering the username and key, the enterprise can get all the serviceable drop pin codes, enterprise can get all the serviceable drop pin codes for all of the carrier partners combined

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Enter the username of the Clickpost dashboard

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Enter the API key given to you by the Clickpost team

get.description: The API takes the pincode and returns an array of all the serviceable carrier partners

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Enter the username of the Clickpost dashboard

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Enter the API key given to you by the Clickpost team

parameters.name: pincode
parameters.description: The PIN code of the location for which you want to check serviceability

parameters.name: is_pickup_pincode
parameters.description: Set as true if you want to check if the location is serviceable for pick up. Set as false otherwise

parameters.name: is_rvp
parameters.description: Set as true if you want to check if the location is serviceable for reverse pick up. Set as false otherwise

message.example: Authentication Failed: Invalid Token or API Key
